name: Theme Hospital

files.gog-installer: N/A:Select the Theme Hospital installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- gog-installer: N/A:Select the Theme Hospital installer provided by GOG
- corsix-th: https://lutris.net/files/games/theme-hospital/CorsixTH-0.40-GNU-Linux.tar.gz
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/CorsixTH/CorsixTH
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/CorsixTH
    file: corsix-th
- execute:
    args: $gog-installer
    file: $GAMEDIR/CorsixTH/Innoextract/innoextract
